description.ko: 지질학적 변화, 풍화 작용, 유기적 성장이 만들어낸 복잡한 패턴을 조명하며 지구의 다양한 지각 표면을 시각적으로 탐구합니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of the Earth's diverse crust, highlighting the intricate patterns formed by geological shifts, weathering, and organic growth.

prompt: Ultra-realistic macro photography of various Earth textures, transitioning from cracked desert clay to mossy forest floor and dark volcanic basalt, intricate geological details, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution, top-down perspective, high contrast, earthy color palette.
